info.name: FHIR Request
info.description:
Make a simple FHIR request with a specific bearer token. Useful for security client tests like SMART and UDAP.

- base_url: points to a running instance of inferno. Typical values will be
    
    - Inferno production: [https://inferno.healthit.gov/suites](https://inferno.healthit.gov/suites)
        
    - Inferno QA: [https://inferno-qa.healthit.gov/suites](https://inferno-qa.healthit.gov/suites)
        
    - Local docker: [http://localhost](http://localhost)
        
    - Local development: [http://localhost:4567](http://localhost:4567)
